abort.external_setup: Logi Circle successfully configured from another flow.
abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.

error.follow_link: Please follow the link and authenticate before pressing Submit.

auth.description:
Please follow the link below and **Accept** access to your Logi Circle account, then come back and press **Submit** below.

[Link]({authorization_url})
auth.title: Authenticate with Logi Circle

user.description: Pick via which authentication provider you want to authenticate with Logi Circle.
user.title: Authentication Provider
